name: treatment of scrap steel, inert material landfill | scrap steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15163/documentation

This dataset represent scrap steel deposition on inert material landfill.

No direct emissions from inert material landfill (leachate) are inventoried as deemed negligible. Module contains only exchanges to process-specific burdens (energy, land use) and infrastructure.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Specific to the technology encountered in Switzerland in 2000. It is assumed, that this technology is valid for other European countries as well.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: landfill with renaturation after closure. 50% of the sites feature a base seal and leachate collection system.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been extrapolated from the global dataset which is based on the Swiss data. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

flow.name: scrap steel
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

exchanges.description: process-specific burdens per kg waste, uncerteinty heeded in module.

flow.name: process-specific burdens, inert material landfill
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
